availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County farmer. Kentucky native. Married Nancy White. Father of William White, James White, Washington White, Joseph White, Martin White, and John White.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1309. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Cumberland, p. 311. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Marrowbone, p. 36. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Careys, District 34, p. 26.
